balu.ImagesAndData package¶

Module contents¶

balu.ImagesAndData.balu_load(name)¶

data = balu_load(data_filename) #without extension

Example:
from balu.ImagesAndData import balu_load data = balu_load(‘datareal’) # data filename
  1. Diego Patiño (dapatinoco@unal.edu.co) (2016)
balu.ImagesAndData.balu_imageload(name)¶

I = balu_imageload(image_filename) #Image filename

Example:
from balu.ImagesAndData import balu_imageload I = balu_imageload(image_filename) # Image filename
  1. Diego Patiño (dapatinoco@unal.edu.co) (2016)
